author: craigmcc
msg: Add unit tests for CORE step implementations:  duplicate, exit, goto, pop,
string, suspend, and swap.
TODO:  tests for get, put, and remove (via name/scope and xpath, in
various scopes).

author: craigmcc
msg: Add convenience constructors that let you construct fully configured Step
implementations with a "new" operator, which will make unit tests much
more concise.  In all cases, there is a zero-args constructor so that you
can build activities and steps from XML input with Digester (or other
similar technologies).

author: craigmcc
msg: When execute() is called at a point at which "nextStep" is null, assume
that we need to start at the beginning of the Activity.  Otherwise, if you
do the following sequence:
Context context = ...
Activity activity = new BaseActivity();
context.setActivity(activity);
and *then* add some steps to the activity, they never get executed.
As a side effect, this change allows you to rerun an Activity if you wish.

author: craigmcc
msg: Add an "id" property to activites.

author: craigmcc
msg: Add "xpath" properties to GetStep and PutStep as alternatives to the
name/scope based bean access methods.  NOTE:  According to the JPath
documentation, you cannot currently use xpath expressions in PutStep to
create a new bean -- only to modify a bean property of an existing bean.
Add a test bean that will be used in unit tests of the "core" Step
implementations.
